sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { authEndpoint, clientId, redirectUri, scopes } from "../auth/config" import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const Login = () => { return ( <> BPM Playlist Maker This app allows you to create playlists based on the BPM of songs to create perfectly customized running playlists. ) } export default Login
